title: Photo Memo widget Android Wear
summary: Widget with 5 quick slot for easy take / view photo for memo. w/ Android Ware.
description: Nice designed quick access to 5-Photo Memo widget.If you have Android Wear or Sony SmartWatch2, you can access photo memo from your wrist!2x3 and 4x1 size widget.Simple usage, take and view photo memo in simple steps.-5 photo memo for quick access-Supports GPS if available (launches Google Map)-Filter effects to match your home design (Original image is not modified)-Share, send via email in simple steps. When sending email, date/time and location where photo taken is automatically attached in mail text.-Silent mode camera-Photo is saved under /sdcard/DCIM/PhotoMemo/ (May vary depending on device you use)*This app is full functional demo version. The word "DEMO" will be shown on preview. DEMO will be gone after unlocker is installed.Silent mode might not work well for some devices. Camera can be used from other applications (If application supports calling external camera app).When GPS is available, GPS info is embedded to image, and you can refer where you took memo afterward.5 photo memos are overwritten when you take new photo, so if you want to keep copy, press Save or enable make copy at taking photo in preference.Smart Connect extension for SmartWatch 2
descriptionHTML:
Nice designed quick access to 5-Photo Memo widget.If you have Android Wear or Sony SmartWatch2, you can access photo memo from your wrist!

2x3 and 4x1 size widget.
Simple usage, take and view photo memo in simple steps.

-5 photo memo for quick access
-Supports GPS if available (launches Google Map)
-Filter effects to match your home design (Original image is not modified)
-Share, send via email in simple steps. When sending email, date/time and location where photo taken is automatically attached in mail text.
-Silent mode camera
-Photo is saved under /sdcard/DCIM/PhotoMemo/ (May vary depending on device you use)

*This app is full functional demo version. The word "DEMO" will be shown on preview. DEMO will be gone after unlocker is installed.

Silent mode might not work well for some devices. Camera can be used from other applications (If application supports calling external camera app).

When GPS is available, GPS info is embedded to image, and you can refer where you took memo afterward.

5 photo memos are overwritten when you take new photo, so if you want to keep copy, press Save or enable make copy at taking photo in preference.

Smart Connect extension for SmartWatch 2
comments: Not have widget! Im using Xperia M2.This apllication is visible on Smartcontent and my Sw2 but not have a widget, cant see it!
